controlName: Ensure changes to system administration scope (sudoers) is collected
controlDescription: Ensure changes to system administration scope (sudoers) is collected

controlName: Ensure actions as another user are always logged
thresholdValue: -a always,exit -F arch=b64 -C euid!=uid -F auid!=unset -S execve -k user_emulation^-a always,exit -F arch=b32 -C euid!=uid -F auid!=unset -S execve -k user_emulation
controlDescription: Ensure actions as another user are always logged

controlName: Ensure events that modify the sudo log file are collected
controlDescription: Ensure events that modify the sudo log file are collected

controlName: Ensure events that modify date and time information are collected
thresholdValue: -a always,exit -F arch=b64 -S adjtimex,settimeofday,clock_settime -k time-change^-a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S adjtimex,settimeofday,clock_settime -k time-change^-w /etc/localtime -p wa -k time-change
controlDescription: Ensure events that modify date and time information are collected

controlName: Ensure events that modify the system's network environment are collected
thresholdValue: -a always,exit -F arch=B64 -S sethostname -S setdomainname -k system-locale^-a always,exit -F arch=B32 -S sethostname -S setdomainname -k system-locale^-w /etc/issue -p wa -k system-locale^-w /etc/issue.net -p wa -k system-locale^-w /etc/hosts -p wa -k system-locale^-w /etc/sysconfig/network -p wa -k system-locale
controlDescription: Ensure events that modify the system's network environment are collected

controlName: Ensure use of privileged commands are collected
controlDescription: Ensure use of privileged commands are collected

controlName: Ensure unsuccessful file access attempts are collected
thresholdValue: -a always,exit -F arch=b64 -S creat,open,openat,truncate,ftruncate -F exit=-EACCES -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k access^-a always,exit -F arch=b64 -S creat,open,openat,truncate,ftruncate -F exit=-EPERM -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k access^-a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S creat,open,openat,truncate,ftruncate -F exit=-EACCES -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k access^-a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S creat,open,openat,truncate,ftruncate -F exit=-EPERM -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k access'
controlDescription: Ensure unsuccessful file access attempts are collected

controlName: Ensure events that modify user/group information are collected
thresholdValue: -w /etc/group -p wa -k identity^-w /etc/passwd -p wa -k identity^-w /etc/gshadow -p wa -k identity^-w /etc/shadow -p wa -k identity^-w /etc/security/opasswd -p wa -k identity
controlDescription: Ensure events that modify user/group information are collected

controlName: Ensure discretionary access control permission modification events are collected
thresholdValue: -a always,exit -F arch=b64 -S chmod,fchmod,fchmodat -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -F key=perm_mod^-a always,exit -F arch=b64 -S chown,fchown,lchown,fchownat -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -F key=perm_mod^-a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S chmod,fchmod,fchmodat -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -F key=perm_mod^-a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S lchown,fchown,chown,fchownat -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -F key=perm_mod^-a always,exit -F arch=b64 -S setxattr,lsetxattr,fsetxattr,removexattr,lremovexattr,fremovexattr -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -F key=perm_mod^-a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S setxattr,lsetxattr,fsetxattr,removexattr,lremovexattr,fremovexattr -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -F key=perm_mod
controlDescription: Ensure discretionary access control permission modification events are collected

controlName: Ensure successful file system mounts are collected
thresholdValue: -a always,exit -F arch=b64 -S mount -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k mounts^-a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S mount -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k mounts
controlDescription: Ensure successful file system mounts are collected

controlName: Ensure session initiation information is collected
thresholdValue: -w /var/run/utmp -p wa -k session ^-w /var/log/wtmp -p wa -k session ^-w /var/log/btmp -p wa -k session
controlDescription: Ensure session initiation information is collected

controlName: Ensure login and logout events are collected
controlDescription: Ensure login and logout events are collected

controlName: Ensure file deletion events by users are collected
thresholdValue: -a always,exit -F arch=b64 -S unlink -S unlinkat -S rename -S renameat -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k delete^-a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S unlink -S unlinkat -S rename -S renameat -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k delete
controlDescription: Ensure file deletion events by users are collected

controlName: Ensure events that modify the system's Mandatory Access Controls are collected
controlDescription: Ensure events that modify the system's Mandatory Access Controls are collected

controlName: Ensure successful and unsuccessful attempts to use the chcon command are recorded
thresholdValue:
-a always,exit -F path=/usr/bin/chcon -F perm=x -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k perm_chng^
-a always,exit -S all -F path=/usr/bin/chcon -F perm=x -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=-1 -F key=perm_chng
controlDescription: Ensure successful and unsuccessful attempts to use the chcon command are recorded

controlName: Ensure successful and unsuccessful attempts to use the setfacl command are recorded
thresholdValue:
-a always,exit -F path=/usr/bin/setfacl -F perm=x -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k perm_chng^
-a always,exit -S all -F path=/usr/bin/setfacl -F perm=x -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=-1 -F key=perm_chng
controlDescription: Ensure successful and unsuccessful attempts to use the setfacl command are recorded

controlName: Ensure successful and unsuccessful attempts to use the chacl command are recorded
thresholdValue:
-a always,exit -F path=/usr/bin/chacl -F perm=x -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k perm_chng^
-a always,exit -S all -F path=/usr/bin/chacl -F perm=x -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=-1 -F key=perm_chng
controlDescription: Ensure successful and unsuccessful attempts to use the chacl command are recorded

controlName: Ensure successful and unsuccessful attempts to use the usermod command are recorded
thresholdValue:
-a always,exit -F path=/usr/sbin/usermod -F perm=x -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k usermod^
-a always,exit -S all -F path=/usr/sbin/usermod -F perm=x -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=-1 -F key=usermod
controlDescription: Ensure successful and unsuccessful attempts to use the usermod command are recorded

controlName: Ensure kernel module loading unloading and modification is collected
thresholdValue: -a always,exit -F arch=b64 -S init_module,finit_module,delete_module,create_module,query_module -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k kernel_modules^-a always,exit -F path=/usr/bin/kmod -F perm=x -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k kernel_modules
controlDescription: Ensure kernel module loading unloading and modification is collected

controlName: Ensure the running and on disk configuration is the same

controlDescription: Ensure the running and on disk configuration is the same

controlName: Linux Command History related checks
thresholdValue:
export HISTFILESIZE
export HISTSIZE
export HISTTIMEFORMAT
export SSH_DETAILS
HISTFILESIZE=50000
HISTSIZE=10000
HISTTIMEFORMAT="%d-%m-%y %T(%Z) -> " # Timestamp
SSH_DETAILS=$(echo "$SSH_LINE" | awk '{if (NF>5) print "Terminal_User
controlDescription: Linux Command History related checks
